NEW_NUMBER.name: NEW_NUMBER
NEW_NUMBER.heading: SURE THING
NEW_NUMBER.text: We're happy to give you a new number, but our promotional service offer is available only to those who transfer their number. Don't worry, you can still join the Inner Circle and get access to all of our amazing perks, you'll just pay the standard service rate.

RESET_PASSWORD.name: RESET_PASSWORD
RESET_PASSWORD.heading: UH OH
RESET_PASSWORD.text: That login information didn’t work. Maybe you forgot. Do you want to try and reset your password?

ELIGIBILITY.name: ELIGIBILITY
ELIGIBILITY.heading: GREAT NEWS!
ELIGIBILITY.text: You’re covered. Just purchase any iphone and you’re all set.

ELIGIBILITY_2.name: ELIGIBILITY
ELIGIBILITY_2.heading: GREAT NEWS!
ELIGIBILITY_2.text: You’re covered and eligible to join the Inner Circle — including our promotional service offer. Just purchase any iphone and you’re all set.

ELIGIBILITY_SITE_VMU.name: ELIGIBILITY_VMU
ELIGIBILITY_SITE_VMU.heading: GREAT NEWS!
ELIGIBILITY_SITE_VMU.text: Upgrade to any iphone and you’re in the Inner Circle!

ELIGIBILITY_SITE_VMU_APPLE.name: ELIGIBILITY_VMU_APPLE
ELIGIBILITY_SITE_VMU_APPLE.heading: GREAT NEWS!
ELIGIBILITY_SITE_VMU_APPLE.text: Upgrade to any iphone and join the Inner Circle to receive the promotional service offer

ELIGIBILITY_SITE_NEW.name: ELIGIBILITY_SITE_NEW
ELIGIBILITY_SITE_NEW.heading: GREAT NEWS!
ELIGIBILITY_SITE_NEW.text: You're covered. Just purchase any iphone and you're all set.

ELIGIBILITY_SITE_MIGRATE.name: ELIGIBILITY_SITE_MIGRATE
ELIGIBILITY_SITE_MIGRATE.heading: GREAT NEWS!
ELIGIBILITY_SITE_MIGRATE.text: You're covered and eligible to join the Inner Circle - including our promotion service offer. Just purchase any iphone and transfer your number to Virgin Mobile and you're all set.

ELIGIBILITY_SITE_UPGRADE.name: ELIGIBILITY_SITE_UPGRADE
ELIGIBILITY_SITE_UPGRADE.heading: WELCOME BACK!
ELIGIBILITY_SITE_UPGRADE.text: Inner Circle members can upgrade to a new iphone anytime. Go to shop iphone to purchase a device. When it arrives, visit My Account and select Swap My Device

ELIGIBILITY_SITE_NO_COVERAGE.name: ELIGIBILITY_SITE_NO_COVERAGE
ELIGIBILITY_SITE_NO_COVERAGE.heading: WELL, THIS IS UNFORTUNATE
ELIGIBILITY_SITE_NO_COVERAGE.text: Unfortunately, it looks like you're outside of our coverage area. We're sorry we can't help you today, but we're constantly improving and expanding our network, so hopefully we can reconnect in the future.

ELIGIBILITY_SITE_NO_TRANSFER.name: ELIGIBILITY_SITE_NO_TRANSFER
ELIGIBILITY_SITE_NO_TRANSFER.heading: LET’S TRY SOMETHING DIFFERENT
ELIGIBILITY_SITE_NO_TRANSFER.text: Your number cannot be transferred. Check that you entered it correctly or contact your current carrier to clear up any existing obligations. Otherwise, you’re welcome to join the Inner Circle with a new.

NO_COVERAGE.name: NO_COVERAGE
NO_COVERAGE.heading: D’oh!
NO_COVERAGE.text: Looks like you’re just outside of our coverage range. As much as we hate to say it, Virgin Mobile isn’t the best choice for you. We’re sorry we can’t help you today, but we’re constantly improving our network so hopefully we can reconnect in the future.

CHECK_STATUS.name: CHECK_STATUS
CHECK_STATUS.heading: Hold Up RAMESH
CHECK_STATUS.text: Looks like that is currently being transferred to the Inner Circle. Click below to view the status of your activation.

UNDER_AGE.name: UNDER_AGE
UNDER_AGE.heading: OOPS
UNDER_AGE.text: We’d love to have you in the Inner Circle, but you must be 18 years old to join (19 if you live in Alabama, or 21 if you’re in Puerto Rico). Come back and join us once you’re eligible!

NO_NUMBER_TRANSFER.name: NO_NUMBER_TRANSFER
NO_NUMBER_TRANSFER.heading: WELL, THIS IS UNFORTUNATE
NO_NUMBER_TRANSFER.text: Your number cannot be transferred. Check that you entered it correctly or contact your current service provider to clear up any existing obligations.

NO_DEVICE_TRANSFER.name: NO_DEVICE_TRANSFER
NO_DEVICE_TRANSFER.heading: WELL, THIS IS UNFORTUNATE
NO_DEVICE_TRANSFER.text: This device is not eligible for transfer to another carrier.  Please check with your current carrier.

DEVICE_IN_LOAN_OR_LEASE.name: DEVICE_IN_LOAN_OR_LEASE
DEVICE_IN_LOAN_OR_LEASE.heading: WELL, THIS IS UNFORTUNATE
DEVICE_IN_LOAN_OR_LEASE.text: This is not eligible to transfer to the Inner Circle due to an existing financial obligation. Please check with your existing mobile provider for more information.

DEVICE_NOT_ELIGIBLE.name: DEVICE_NOT_ELIGIBLE
DEVICE_NOT_ELIGIBLE.heading: WELL, THIS IS UNFORTUNATE
DEVICE_NOT_ELIGIBLE.text: This not eligible to transfer to the Inner Circle. Please check with your existing mobile provider for more information.

DEVICE_NOT_COMPATIBLE.name: DEVICE_NOT_COMPATIBLE
DEVICE_NOT_COMPATIBLE.heading: WELL, THIS IS UNFORTUNATE
DEVICE_NOT_COMPATIBLE.text: This is not compatible with the Inner Circle. We’d love to have you in the Inner Circle­­, you’ll just need to buy a new iphone to join.

CALL_CARE.name: CALL_CARE
CALL_CARE.heading: OOPS
CALL_CARE.text: We don’t recognize this device. Please contact customer support

CALL_CARE_LOGIN.name: CALL_CARE_LOGIN
CALL_CARE_LOGIN.heading: OOPS
CALL_CARE_LOGIN.text: Looks like there may be a problem with your account. Please contact customer support

CALL_CARE_POSTPAID.name: CALL_CARE_POSTPAID
CALL_CARE_POSTPAID.heading: OOPS
CALL_CARE_POSTPAID.text: Looks like there may be a problem with your current carrier

LOCKED_PHONE.name: LOCKED_PHONE
LOCKED_PHONE.heading: OOPS
LOCKED_PHONE.text: Your old iphone has find My iphone enabled which locks the Iphone

LOGIN_FAILED.name: LOGIN_FAILED
LOGIN_FAILED.heading: LOGIN FAILED
LOGIN_FAILED.text: For your security, this account has been temporarily locked. Please try again after 3 hours

LOGIN_EXPIRED.name: LOGIN_EXPIRED
LOGIN_EXPIRED.heading: Are you still there?
LOGIN_EXPIRED.text: Your session has timed out due to inactivity. Click below to start over.

RTM_MEMBER.name: RTM_MEMBER
RTM_MEMBER.heading: WELCOME BACK!
RTM_MEMBER.text: To activate a new device and add it to your account go to My Account and select Swap My Device

ELIGIBILITYNEWYES.name: ELIGIBILITYNEWYES
ELIGIBILITYNEWYES.heading: WELCOME BACK!
ELIGIBILITYNEWYES.text: To activate a new device and add it to your account go to My Account and select Swap My Device

ELIGIBILITYNEWNO.name: ELIGIBILITYNEWNO
ELIGIBILITYNEWNO.heading: Great News
ELIGIBILITYNEWNO.text: you're covered and eligible, buy iphone and transfer your number and you're all set.

ELIGIBILITYNOCOVERAGE.name: ELIGIBILITYNOCOVERAGE
ELIGIBILITYNOCOVERAGE.heading: Bad News
ELIGIBILITYNOCOVERAGE.text: Unfortunately you`re out of the coverage area.

RTM_MEMBER_ELIGIBILITY.name: RTM_MEMBER_ELIGIBILITY
RTM_MEMBER_ELIGIBILITY.heading: Bad News
RTM_MEMBER_ELIGIBILITY.text: Unfortunately you`re out of the coverage area.

ELIGIBILITY_PORTIN_NUMBER.name: ELIGIBILITY_PORTIN_NUMBER
ELIGIBILITY_PORTIN_NUMBER.heading: Well, This is Unfortunate
ELIGIBILITY_PORTIN_NUMBER.text: Number cannot be transferred. Try again or new number?

ELIGIBILITY_NEW_NUMBER.name: ELIGIBILITY_NEW_NUMBER
ELIGIBILITY_NEW_NUMBER.heading: SURE THING
ELIGIBILITY_NEW_NUMBER.text: We're happy to offer you a new number but promo only for those who port

ELIGIBILITY_MIGRATION2.text: The good news is you are eligible to join the Inner Circle, including the promotional service offer – just buy an iphone and transfer your number to Virgin Mobile.  The bad news is we’re experiencing a system problem at this time.  To complete your transaction, please call customer support at

ACTIVATION_MIGRATION.text: We’re happy to help you activate your iphone, but we’re experiencing a system problem at the moment. To complete your activation, please give us a call at:
